timelineData.title: Product Engineer
description: Contributed as a full-stack engineer on the Messenger team, enhancing and maintaining Intercom's customer-facing chat product
Implemented accessibility improvements independently, helping ensure compliance and usability for high-value customers saving deal worth $500K ARR
Contributed to the development of Messenger Dark Mode on web, focusing very deeply on design ensuring every aspect is perfect
Triaged and responded to on-call alerts and issues, coordinating with multiple teams, debugging customer-facing problems, and investigating alarms to maintain system reliability
Proactively prioritized and resolved high-impact issues, focusing on customers with large ARR or widespread product usage, fixed issues totaling `X` million ARR

timelineData.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Performed weekly data fixes using SQL Server to maintain data integrity and accuracy
Identified and debugged critical issues in SSIS applications and Powershell scripts
Collaborated with Agile teams to deliver process improvements within tight deadlines
Programmed and implemented automation processes using SSIS, Excel, PowerShell, and SQL Server to optimize workflows
Verified system accuracy and compliance with data validation protocols using Excel and SQL

timelineData.title: Bachelor of Computer Science
description: Completed comprehensive coursework in algorithms, data structures, and software development

timelineData.title: Security Guard
description: Worked as a security guard at various locations throughout Dublin

timelineData.title: Leaving Certificate
description: Strong performance in DCG, Engineering, Maths, Physics, and Applied Maths
Developed strong analytical and problem-solving skills
